title: Form flow definition
description: Representation of a form flow definition

startStep.description: This must contain the key of the first step of the form flow

steps.description: This array should contain all the possible steps of the form flow

key.description: The identifying human readable key of the step

nextSteps.description: The possible next steps. A condition must be added on all steps but one. The step without a condition is the default step that will be used when all conditions fail

step.title: The key of the next step. This should match one of the keys in the steps array

condition.title: This should contain an expression telling what condition should be met to go to this next step. If there is no condition this is the default next step.

nextStep:.description: The key of the next step in the flow. When multiple steps should be available you should use the property 'nextSteps'
